High Priest Orven:
Welcome to Aden, the heart of our kingdom! It is rightly called the cultural and religious center. The Temple of Light is a bastion of our faith, the beacon showing the way to all Einhasad's faithful.
However, the flame of true faith is burning not only within the walls of this temple. There are many other places filled with Einhasad's grace. A prayer reaching to the heart of the Mother of Light can be heard even in the house of a common villager.
